hero.title: Isikhungo Sakho Sokubusa Imithombo Yezokuxhumana
hero.subtitle: Khiqiza okuqukethwe okumangalisayo ngezilimi zonke eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni. Yakhelwe amaSouth African, ngamaSouth African.

features.title: Yakhelwe i-Mzansi
features.subtitle: I-Purple Glow ayihunyushwe nje—iyaqonda amasiko. Kusukela eslingweni lase-township kuya ku-Afrikaans yamabhizinisi.

aiEngine.title: Injini Yokuqukethwe kwe-AI
aiEngine.description: I-Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 inikeza amandla ezithombe zakho. Khiqiza umbhalo, izithombe, namavidiyo azoxhumana nezilaleli zase-SA.

multilingual.title: Izilimi Ezingu-11, Inkundla Eyodwa
multilingual.description: Thumela nge-isiZulu ekuseni, isi-Afrikaans emini, isi-English ntambama. Shintsha izilimi phakathi komusho.

scheduling.title: Ukuhlela Okuhlakaniphile
scheduling.description: I-AI ifunda izikhathi ezihle kakhulu zokuthumela kuzilaleli zakho. Hlela okuqukethwe kwenyanga yonke emizuzwini eyi-10.

step1.title: Chaza I-Vibe Yakho
step1.description: Tshela i-Purple Glow ukuthi uthengisani noma ukhuthazani. Khetha ithoni yakho: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, noma Cyberpunk.

step2.title: I-AI Ikhiqiza Okuqukethwe
step2.description: Injini yethu enikezwe amandla yi-Gemini idala izithombe ezilungiselelwe inkundla ngezithombe ngemizuzwana.

step3.title: Hlela & Thumela
step3.description: Buyekeza, hlela, noma uhlele. I-Purple Glow iphethe okusele—iphinde iphakamise izikhathi ezihle kakhulu zokuthumela.

thabo.quote: I-Purple Glow ingisize ngikwazi ukukhula kusukela ku-500 kuya ku-5,000 abalandeli ezinyangeni ezi-3. Okuqukethwe kwesi-Zulu kubhida kwehlukile.
thabo.name: Thabo M.

zanele.quote: Sengikwazi ukuthumela ngezilimi zonke ezingu-11 ngaphandle kokuqasha umhumuseli. Igeyimu ishintshile kumabhizinisi ase-township.
zanele.name: Zanele K.

pieter.quote: I-AI iqonda izaga zesi-Afrikaans kangcono kunethimba lami lezokumaketha. Ons is baie impressed.
pieter.name: Pieter v.d.M.

pricing.title: Amanani Acace. Awekho Amaholo Afihliwe.
pricing.subtitle: Qala mahhala. Khula njengoba ukhula. Khansela noma nini.

credits.title: Udinga amandla engeziwe?
credits.subtitle: Amanani wesithombe noma ividiyo mancane? Gcwalisa ngokushesha ngaphandle kokushintsha okubhaliselwe.
